title: Gamification-Enhanced Mathematics Vocabulary Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical terminology comprehension and fundamental smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Real-time competitive vocabulary learning via Zoom and mobile game apps (e.g., Quizlet Live), combining group and individual activities to boost learning motivation.

learning_goals: Learners can define 50 basic math terms at ≥80% accuracy over two weeks
Through gamification activities, learners solve ≥70% of math terminology application problems while maintaining learning motivation
Learners enhance communication skills by collaborating in group competitions and exchanging peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
